statements: SELECT * FROM shopping_cart WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT item_name, price FROM shopping_cart WHERE quantity > 2 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM shopping_cart WHERE item_id IN (10, 15, 20);
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM shopping_cart GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(price) > 100;
SELECT cart_id, item_name, price FROM shopping_cart WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY cart_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM shopping_cart WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY cart_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM shopping_cart WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT cart_id, customer_id, item_name FROM shopping_cart WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY cart_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM shopping_cart WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM shopping_cart GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_quantity > 20;
SELECT * FROM shopping_cart WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT customer_id, item_id, price FROM shopping_cart WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM shopping_cart WHERE item_id = 5 AND quantity <= 5
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_price FROM shopping_cart GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_price > 500
SELECT * FROM shopping_cart WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM shopping_cart GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_quantity > 20
SELECT * FROM shopping_cart JOIN customers ON shopping_cart.customer_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT * FROM shopping_cart WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers INNER JOIN cart_items ON customers.customer_id = cart_items.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers LEFT JOIN cart_items ON customers.customer_id = cart_items.customer_id WHERE cart_items.quantity > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cart_items WHERE item_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN shopping_cart sc ON c.customer_id = sc.customer_id JOIN cart_items ci ON sc.cart_id = ci.cart_id JOIN products p ON ci.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN shopping_cart sc ON c.customer_id = sc.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT cart_id, product_id, quantity FROM cart_items WHERE cart_id = 1 AND product_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT u.username, c.creation_date, c.is_active FROM users u JOIN carts c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT o.user_id, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_items FROM orders o JOIN cart_items oi ON o.user_id = oi.cart_id GROUP BY o.user_id HAVING total_items > 5;
